OOC Big deal, I met Tiger in Akron, my brother works for MCdonald and
company (They handle the promotions for the PGA tour) Tiger Woods seems like
a nice guy but he still puts his pants on one leg at a time just like the
rest of us.

BOC Phobias ship senses the fire at the Predacon cave. "Return to your
landing site" he instructed. The ship returned to the base.

The back ramp opened "KitKat lead the predacons to my ship, I'll get them to
safety."  The spiderbot instructed the potential leader of the Predacons. He
didn't like abandoning base like this but if he had his way they'd have a
better base to use to end the beast wars.


----- Original Message -----
From: <minime_316@...>
To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
Sent: Thursday, September 07, 2000 4:43 PM
Subject: Re: RETREAT!


>
> (Sorry I didn't get to post until now everyone, but you'll never in a
> million years guess where I went today. I live in Oakville Ontario
> Canada, and maybe some of you know from the news, and I'm pretty sure
> dcoburn knows cause he's canadian too, but this week in Oakville is
> the PGA Canadian Open, where all the golf stars come for a
> tournament, and this year TIGER WOODS came, for the first time in 3
> years, and the last time he came the thing was in Montreal so I
> didn't see him but anyway I got his autgraph and shook his hand, and
> we had a conversation about how he played the round. I still can't
> believe it. I HAD A CONVERSATION WITH TIGER WOODS!!!!!! Sorry, I was
> screaming all the way home. Damn it, I'm acting like a school girl.)
>
> Vulois
>
> Vulois lead Windrazor and Terradive deeper and deeper into the
> mountain.
>
> "Um.....Now I don't knwo if this is the right way, and it's too late
> to turn back."
>
> Vulois continued to go down the tunnel in faint hope.
> ______________________________________________________________________
> Fliq/Brix
>
> The space travellers continued to remove the hull, when Brix piped up.
>
> "So, Ramulus, like that view of the earth from up here? Beautiful,
> ain't it."
> ______________________________________________________________________
> Gotron/Starscream
>
> Gotron was unnoticed in the battle, so he quietly snuck into the Pred
> cave. The Preds maybe willing to retreat, but Gotron wasn't ready
> yet. He stood just inside the door. He would probably die because of
> this, but he might knock off Deemos in the process. He waited for the
> Chosen Ones to claim their prise.
>
> Starscream heard the word to retreat.
>
> "No way! Predacons never die down! I will not retreat!!!!!"
>
> Starscream entered the Pred cave, but immediatly was caught by a
> right fist. Gotron and Starscream met eyes, and each thinking the
> other was a Maximal, started firing with blasters. Most of the shots
> went wide, hitting, and destroying the Pred cave.
> ______________________________________________________________________
> Noble/Savage
>
> Noble was wandering around a valley, regaining strength, we looke dup
> to a cliff and saw too bots(Spears and Striker). Another chance to
> kill bots, he thought. He forced his anger under control, and worked
> to the bottom of the ledge. There he transformed into Savage. He flew
> up to meet them, and as soon as their eyes met he fired a large
> fireball.
>
>
>
>
>
